hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsi/webapps/safi-smsi-server*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for app/db to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
cd /opt/checkouts/dai-smsi/safi-smsi-server/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai03 smsi stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai03 smsi-admin stop
echo "@genUser.scrum2.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.120)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum002)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployRebuildDb.sh -a safi-smsi-server -t dai-smsi -i smsi -r ${VERSION} -e 10.13.18.116 -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.120:1522:scrum002" -p SC2_SMSI -u SC2_SMSI -v
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai03 smsi-admin start
print dai-smsi-${VERSION} > /var/www/html/scrum2/smsi.txt print dai-smsi-${VERSION} > /var/www/html/scrum2/smsi_db.txt
